gen:link.msg:message: `NetResult` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_NetResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_NetResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfNetResultCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfNetResultCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfNetResultDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedProfitAndLossAccountHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfNetResultDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
